learnAboutUsAndOurTeam: Learn about us and our team

cassiusTitusDescription: CASSIUS TITUS is an attorney with expertise helping creatives develop, protect and distribute their products and services. He established © Clinic to link creative communities with live expert copyright counsel.
trustedPlatformDescription: Your trusted platform for copyright protection and management. Get started by exploring our features.

whatWeDoDescription: We connect you with expert counsel to advise how you can protect and distribute your creative works
musicLicensingDescription: Secure your music rights with expert help on licensing, copyright, and distribution.
visualArtistsRightsDescription: Protect your visual creations with guidance on copyright, usage, moral rights and ownership.
videoAndMediaDescription: Safeguard your films and digital content with expert copyright and licensing support.
artificialIntelligenceDescription: Get counsel on modeling and use of AI generated content.
writersDescription: Get advice on fair use, co-authorship, infringement and registration.
